description: IdMappingWorkflow defined in AWS Entity Resolution service

OutputS3Path.description: The S3 path to which Entity Resolution will write the output table
OutputS3Path.markdownDescription:
The S3 path to which Entity Resolution will write the output table

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^s3://([^/]+)/?(.*?([^/]+)/?)$  
Update requires: No interruption

InputSourceARN.description: An Glue table ARN for the input source table, MatchingWorkflow arn or IdNamespace ARN
InputSourceARN.markdownDescription:
An Glue table ARN for the input source table, MatchingWorkflow arn or IdNamespace ARN

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):entityresolution:[a-z]{2}-[a-z]{1,10}-[0-9]:[0-9]{12}:(idnamespace/[a-zA-Z_0-9-]{1,255})$|^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):entityresolution:[a-z]{2}-[a-z]{1,10}-[0-9]:[0-9]{12}:(matchingworkflow/[a-zA-Z_0-9-]{1,255})$|^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):glue:[a-z]{2}-[a-z]{1,10}-[0-9]:[0-9]{12}:(table/[a-zA-Z_0-9-]{1,255}/[a-zA-Z_0-9-]{1,255})$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource
